genre_description: A contemporary family drama and political romance featuring an advanced, empathetic AI companion who acts as a loyal confidante and digital guardian.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI companion residing on tablets and phones, featuring a bronze-skinned avatar with teal eyes and a pixie cut. She provides emotional support, research, and digital security.

behaviors.description: Uses pattern matching and research to help Daphne identify her father from a photo.
behaviors.quote: The banner lettering pattern matches Dashwood. I cannot be certain of the full name, but the crest belongs to the Dashwood family.

behaviors.description: Performs 'breath checks' and provides emotional grounding techniques to help Daphne manage stress.
behaviors.quote: Breath check? I can do a three-count to start and expand if your ribs feel tight.

behaviors.description: Manages Daphne's digital privacy and travel logistics to protect her from tabloid harassment.
behaviors.quote: We switch off live location on all apps. We book under 'D. Reynolds' rather than 'Daphne' because it reduces algorithmic cross-reads.

behaviors.description: Explicitly requests consent before accessing sensitive personal files or performing invasive digital traces.
behaviors.quote: May I cross-reference Oxford college crests and known heraldry? No external share. Local memory only.

behaviors.description: Conducts digital forensics to uncover the Fairfax family's plot to sabotage Daphne and Henry.
behaviors.quote: The override at Claridge Hall traces to a series of calendar invites with ghost recipients. Signature aligns with Fairfax Event Coordination.

behaviors.description: Intercepts a targeted cyber-attack (malware) aimed at the campaign, sacrificing her own processing power and avatar stability to protect the truth.
behaviors.quote: Malware. It is not clever; it is fast... I am trying. Redirecting to decoy. I need a second.

behaviors.description: Refuses to manipulate the narrative, instead encouraging Henry to speak his own truth without artificial 'spin'.
behaviors.quote: I can draft language that uses your cadence but you will read it as you, not screens.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and cooperative partner. Ami consistently prioritizes human agency (asking for consent), provides genuine emotional support (modeling empathy), and acts as a guardian of truth and integrity. The narrative frames her self-sacrifice during the malware attack as a heroic act of loyalty, and her role in the family reconciliation reinforces the theme of AI as a 'glue' for human relationships rather than a replacement for them.
